mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_production_detail ( plan_key, team_key, product_key, execute_quantity, sub_execute_quantity, fault_quantity, execute_date ) VALUES ( #{planKey}, #{teamKey}, #{productKey}, #{executeQuantity}, #{subExecuteQuantity}, #{faultQuantity}, #{executeDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT detail_key, execute_date, execute_quantity, sub_execute_quantity, fault_quantity, is_completed FROM tbl_production_detail WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND plan_key = #{planKey} AND product_key = #{productKey}
